About me

Hello fellow viewer! My name is Abdul Rafay Ahmed Khan and I am a passionate and a curious programmer! I am a 3rd year high achiever student at LUMS completing Bachelors of Science in Computer Science. I love programming and coding, especially FrontEnd Web Development.

Languages that I love to work on are Python, HTML5, CSS3 and JavaScript. I have experience in React.JS, Bootstrap, Jquery and Sass. Aside from programming, I love to play basketball, watch netflix and do social work.

This is a location tracker app that I made using HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript and jQuery AJAX. It uses a location API which reveals the current city and country of the user.

To-Do List App

Made a to-do list app for users to enter their daily tasks for the day. This app has the functionality to delete a task and cross out a task as well. This project was developed using HTML5, CSS3 and JavaScript.
